title.rendered: Achievement Alert! Search Berg Completes 20,000 Projects!

content.rendered:
What better way to start a new year than by celebrating a new achievement!

Search Berg is venturing into 2019 with confidence, after a very successful and rewarding 2018. Having worked with thousands of clients over the past 10 years, we are proud to say that as of January 2019, we have successfully completed more than twenty thousand internet marketing projects for our clients! That’s right, 20,000!

This is a monumental feat and we couldn’t be happier. The amount of growth we have experienced both in terms of employees and clients has been staggering. Just two years ago, the company successfully managed 10,000 projects. It just goes to prove that our results-driven digital marketing strategies are being appreciated and accepted by clients who continue to work with us year after years. Some of our clients have been with us for 5 years!

Search Berg: A Success Story

We at Search Berg have accomplished numerous goals and crossed several milestones. One of the biggest contributors to our success is the trustful relationships that we have built with our clients by making sure that our clients see quantifiable, tangible results for their respective marketing campaigns. With the amalgamation of our creative SEO and expertise in accordance with the client’s vision, Search Berg has produced not just exceptional projects but also establishes a loyal clientele.

In addition to completing 20,000 projects, Search Berg has also gained international recognition for other rewards. We were awarded the Site Jabber Customer Choice Award in 2017 and 2018 respectively, 2 years in a row! We are ranked the #1 digital marketing agency in New York by Clutch.

Delivering Tomorrow’s Solutions Today!

When you talk about Search Berg SEO, you are talking about an SEO process designed to first and foremost, give clients peace of mind.

There are no contractual obligations. No hidden fees.

Our SEO is 100% white-hat meaning it conforms to Google guidelines for building links.

Our clients get full access to the Client Dashboard where they can monitor rankings, analyze web traffic, review work done and manage their entire project; all from one platform.

And then to top it off, our SEO comes with a 100% money back guarantee.

You simply can’t go wrong with Search Berg.

Our services and results aren’t restricted to a particular industry or region. We have clients worldwide and our clients are as diverse in their industry as their projects. We have worked with healthcare services, law firms, real estate, HVAC companies, bail bonds providers, and remodeling businesses, authors, retail businesses and many more.

Get in touch with the company for a full description of their services or to hire their services.
